title: Calculate periodogram — cspgram
text: Calculate periodogram time-course using Lomb-Scargle, fast Fourier transform, selected version chi-square. spectr function wrapper various methods. lspgram turn wrapper lomb::lsp(), fftpgram wrapper stats::spec.pgram(). Among versions chi-square, highly recommended use greedy, lower bias standard lower variance conservative.

title: Calculate periodogram — cspgram
code: cspgram(   x,   deltat,   periodRange = c(18, 32),   method = c("greedy", "conservative", "standard"),   na.action = stats::na.fail,   dopar = FALSE )  fftpgram(   x,   deltat,   periodRange = c(18, 32),   pad = 50,   na.action = stats::na.fail,   ... )  lspgram(x, deltat, time, periodRange = c(18, 32), ofac = 50)  spectr(   x,   deltat,   time,   periodRange = c(18, 32),   method = c("greedy_chisq", "conservative_chisq", "standard_chisq", "lombscargle",     "fft"),   ofac = 50,   pad = 50,   na.action = stats::na.fail,   dopar = FALSE,   ... )

title: Calculate periodogram — cspgram
text: x Numeric vector measurements. deltat Numeric value interval time-points. periodRange Numeric vector minimum maximum values period consider, units deltat time. method Character indicating method use. Can unambiguous substring full name. na.action Function specifying handle NA values x. Default stats::na.fail(), gives error values missing. Ignored Lomb-Scargle. dopar Logical indicating whether run calculations parallel parallel backend already set , e.g., using doParallel::registerDoParallel(). used chi-square. pad Numeric value proportion length x pad x zeros. Must > 0. used FFT. ... arguments passed stats::spec.pgram() FFT. time Numeric vector time-points. Can specified instead deltat Lomb-Scargle. ofac Integer value oversampling factor. Must >= 1. used Lomb-Scargle.

title: Calculate periodogram — cspgram
text: data.table various columns depending method. version chi-square, columns period, chisq, df, log_pval. log p-value reliable p-value, since R finite precision, p-values less 5e-324 set 0. Lomb-Scargle FFT, columns period power.

title: Calculate periodogram — cspgram
code: library('data.table')  set.seed(1789) deltat = 0.1 tau = 25 tt = seq(0, 24 * 3, deltat) x = 3 * sin(tt / tau * 2 * pi) + rnorm(length(tt))  specCsp = spectr(x, deltat, method = 'greedy') peakCsp = specCsp[which.min(log_pval)]  specLsp = spectr(x, deltat, method = 'lomb') peakLsp = specLsp[which.max(power)]  specFft = spectr(x, deltat, method = 'fft') peakFft = specFft[which.max(power)]
